item.title: Digital Tools
item.description: Brazilian Humanities Digital Repository - REDHBR Access the page here! REDHBR aggregates codes for automated data collection regarding the main events and associations in the humanities area in Brazil. Scripts, databases and all documents are available and can be downloaded with just one click. pyHDB - Heuristic tool for the Brazilian Digital Newspaper Library Access the tool here Methodological aid tool for research in the Brazilian Digital Newspaper Library of the National Library.
